name: Diminish Resistance
components: V, S, M/DF (a pinch of coarse sand)
text: You weaken a creature’s resistance against one energy type you select: acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The creature’s resistance to that energy type decreases by 5 (minimum 0), plus an additional 5 for every 5 caster levels beyond 3rd (to a maximum of 20 at 18th level).
components_zh: 言语，姿势，材料/法器（ 一撮粗砂）
text_zh: 你削弱一个生物对你选择的一种类型的能量的抗力：强酸、寒冷、电击、火焰或音波。该生物对该种能量的抗力降低5点（最低0点），3级后，每5施法者增加5点（18级时达到最多的20点）。
